name: RabbitMq to Pub/Sub
description: Streaming pipeline. Ingests RabbitMQ Queue Messages to a Pub/Sub topic

parameters.name: connectionUrl
parameters.label: Rabbitmq Connection Url
parameters.helpText: plain text such as (amqp://username:password@ampq_server:5671) or secret resource ID (projects/{project}/secrets/{secret}/versions/{secret_version})

parameters.name: queue
parameters.label: Rabbitmq queue name
parameters.helpText: RabbitMq queue to read data from

parameters.name: outputTopic
parameters.label: Pub/Sub output topic
parameters.helpText: Pub/Sub topic to write the output, in the format of 'projects/yourproject/topics/yourtopic'
